data.title: Current City Codes Study List.
data.meta_description: As most of you know, at the end of your first week of training you will be given a test on Southwest's current city codes and you'll need an 80% to pass. However,
data.text:
As most of you know, at the end of your first week of training you will be given a test on Southwest's current city codes and you'll need an 80% to pass. However, our customers expect the best from us, so we should really aim for 100%. Also, we use these codes daily in our work, so we have to know them anyway.

Until I finish working on a comprehensive flashcard set, I took this list off the official Southwest Airlines 'Where We Fly' website. Happy studying!

Albany, NY - ALB

Albuquerque, NM - ABQ

Amarillo, TX - AMA

Here's a study stack.

Note: you can scroll below the stack for a bunch of games with this set too.

Also if you click on "options" on the top right you can switch it so it says the name of the airport first instead of the airport code.

Study Stack - SWA Airport Codes

-You're Now Free To Move About The Country
